content: > love our knits join our mailing list to be kept up to date on new designs and sales 1 knox mountain park is a natural recreation area located in the heart of kelowna bc the park s tree-lined trails reveal an array of flora and fauna as they transition from lakeshore to summit highlighting the wonder and diversity of the okanagan landscape knox socks are a simple stockinette sock pattern designed with an afterthought heel and instructions for either toe-up or cuff-down use self-striping and let the yarn do the work for you or combine your favorite colours for contrasting heels and toes **| sizing |** sizes 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 to fit baby toddler child s child m child l adult s adult m adult l adult xl **| gauge/suggested needles |** 32 st and 51 rounds over 4 / 10cm in stockinette stitch *a different gauge will affect finished measurements and yardage requirements * suggested needles 2 25mm us 1 or size needed to obtain above listed gauge in preferred style for working in the round **| materials |** **required yardage ** see photo for estimated yardage for each size **notions ** stitch markers waste yarn darning needle **| shown in |** gauge dyeworks merino twist fingering 80% merino 20% nylon plied 443y / 405m per 115g using our solar system round trip tech edited by emilytechedits /people/emilytechedits 1 https //view flodesk com/pages/5f8d47591bb8f65879fec8de
